Stocks forming Diamond TopFTSV AYX ARWR LXP EXEL The Diamond Top occurs when the price reaches a top and exhibits signs of reversal as it has broken downward after a period of uncertainty or consolidationstocksnysetradinginvestingstockmarketnysenasdaqgrowtradeinvestoptionstradinghedginghodloptionstrader

EXEL Yet because INCY mgmt gives guidance among other aspects of the business theyre able to garner higher multiples CEOs and CFOs who fail to understand the value of guidance to investors is short sighted Guidance is nothing more than a companys willingness to be judged by the business plan to which its already committed

EXEL EXEL is run well but PPS could be better Morrissey repeatedly states that the company has progressed to a point where they no longer need to share half baked data I agree However mgmt needs to provide ANNUAL not quarterly revenue guidance not just cost guidance Not doing so tells the market and potential buyerscompetitors mgmt is not confident This is not trade secret Since mgmt believes in their 35 growth figures then guide revenues at 25 and then beat est Morrissey should look at how INCY interacts with street and take note Lots of parallels between companies eg one molecule brings in a lion share of revenues and is approved across multiple indications Pipeline progress is impressive for both firms in the near term
